recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. In another pan, saut√© onion and garlic, then add ground beef and tomato sauce. Simmer for 15 minutes and serve over spaghetti.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Grill chicken breast. Chop lettuce and mix with croutons, parmesan, and dressing. Top with grilled chicken slices.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Chop vegetables. Stir fry in a hot pan with ginger and soy sauce for 10 minutes. Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, milk, egg, and sugar into a batter. Heat a pan, melt butter, and pour batter in small circles. Cook until golden on both sides.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook ground beef with spices. Warm tortillas, add beef, and top with cheese, lettuce, and salsa.
